node.name: Unlock & Hats (test)
node.description: A tree to test integration with Unlock Protocol

node.name: Autonomous Admin
node.description: Needs to be worn by the UnlockEligibility module, where it will serve as an onKeyPurchase hook in the Lock, enabling it to mint hat 31.1.1 when a key is purchased.

node.name: Paid Hat
node.description: Get this hat by purchasing the [Unlock Protocol key](https://app.unlock-protocol.com/checkout?id=033ba17a-3f68-46de-86ac-b32eca32847a)
